Uses of Interface
org.jfree.chart.event.RendererChangeListener

  • Packages that use RendererChangeListener 
    Package Description
    org.jfree.chart.plot
    Plot classes and related interfaces.
    org.jfree.chart.renderer
    Core support for the plug-in renderers used by the CategoryPlot and XYPlot classes.
    org.jfree.chart.renderer.category
    Plug-in renderers for the CategoryPlot class.
    org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy
    Plug-in renderers for the XYPlot class.

    • Uses of RendererChangeListener in org.jfree.chart.plot

      Classes in org.jfree.chart.plot that implement RendererChangeListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CategoryPlot
      A general plotting class that uses data from a CategoryDataset and renders each data item using a CategoryItemRenderer.
      class  CombinedDomainCategoryPlot
      A combined category plot where the domain axis is shared.
      class  CombinedDomainXYPlot
      An extension of XYPlot that contains multiple subplots that share a common domain axis.
      class  CombinedRangeCategoryPlot
      A combined category plot where the range axis is shared.
      class  CombinedRangeXYPlot
      An extension of XYPlot that contains multiple subplots that share a common range axis.
      class  PolarPlot
      Plots data that is in (theta, radius) pairs where theta equal to zero is due north and increases clockwise.
      class  WaferMapPlot
      A wafer map plot.
      class  XYPlot
      A general class for plotting data in the form of (x, y) pairs.

    • Uses of RendererChangeListener in org.jfree.chart.renderer

      Methods in org.jfree.chart.renderer with parameters of type RendererChangeListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractRenderer.addChangeListener(RendererChangeListener listener)
      Registers an object to receive notification of changes to the renderer.
      void PolarItemRenderer.addChangeListener(RendererChangeListener listener)
      Adds a change listener.
      void AbstractRenderer.removeChangeListener(RendererChangeListener listener)
      Deregisters an object so that it no longer receives notification of changes to the renderer.
      void PolarItemRenderer.removeChangeListener(RendererChangeListener listener)
      Removes a change listener.

      Adds a change listener.
      void CategoryItemRenderer.removeChangeListener(RendererChangeListener listener)
